sentences.sentence: Her strength, determined will and attitude symbolize all Paralympians.
sentences.translation: 她的力量、坚定的信念和态度象征着所有残疾人运动员。

sentences.sentence: Paralympians are the heart of the games, they emphasize their athletic achievements rather than their disabilities.
sentences.translation: 残奥会的参赛运动员是残奥会的核心，与自身的残障相比，他们更重视自己的运动成绩。

sentences.sentence: One photo shows Russians kissing MEDALS and another shows Paralympians in wheelchairs holding victory bouquets above their heads.
sentences.translation: 一张照片上，几个俄国人正在亲吻奖牌，另一张照片上，残奥会运动员们坐在轮椅上，把胜利花束举过头顶。
